ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk looked on as the battle continued to rage, she could see the Lavacons combining. This is worth taking note of. she thought as the giant bot

Lady Hawk looked on as the battle continued to rage, she could see 
the Lavacons combining. "This is worth taking note of." she thought 
as the giant bot appeared. Her middle eye clicked taking images to 
remember. If her fathers dream was  so he knowds who to be fulfilled 
he would need studies of every bot she encounters. so they'd know who 
the potential threats are.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Dark Lavacons::
 >        The Dark Lavacons keep rampaging around, destroying 
everything.  But, this Oblitertron.......The 
name........Oblitertron........It had the Dark Lavacon feel in 
it.........Destruction.....Obliteration..........Hmm.
> 
>          The Dark Lavacons suddenly all had an idea.  They weren't 
completely mindless, they could still think somewhat.......Yes, the 
Dark Lavacons and these dudes were somewhat alike.....Yes, that was 
it!!!!
> 
>           All the Dark Lavacons made a circle together, and then, 
dark fire started coming.  A little stream of dark lava appeared.  
Suddenly, they all started floating up and weird stuff.
> 
>          Fenox flew up, and pressed a button on his shoulder.  
Then, what looked like a head appeared.  And a......A body too, chest 
and stomach, with Fenox inside!!!!
> 
>        Then, Astral flew up, and was in the head.  
> 
>       Starlight and Recklessa came up, and they each pressed the 
button on their shoulders.  Yes.....It was making sence now.  
Starlight was in an arm, which attached on to the right of the body, 
and Recklessa in an arm which went on to the left.
> 
>        Griplash finally came up, and was in the lower part of the 
body, he pressed a button on his shoulder, and two legs formed.  And 
their, stood a gestalt.....A giant robot.........Dark Lavatron.
> 
>         Dark Lavatron grinned, and laughed evilly.
> 
>         Astral, in the head, spoke, with a dark, evil voice.
> 
>         "Alliance!!!!!  Let us come together, and make an ultimate 
Alliance!!!!!  We can destroy vast galaxies!!!!!  Think about 
it!!!!!  Destruction reigning everywhere!!!!!  Do you wish to join, 
and become one, or do you wish to die??"
